Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I'm extending you a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $15000. I believe this investment will pay off in terms of convenience, efficiency, and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
